ModMetaData.name: Planning Extended
ModMetaData.author: Scherub
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds a more advanced planning menu.
Features
- Draw colored designations, such as walls, doors, objects and floors - Optionally skip (don't overwrite) already placed plan designations - Use different shapes, e.g. rectangle, area, cross - Copy / Paste your plans - Undo / Redo your planned actions - More coming soon
